Uses of Class
model.spreadsheet.GradingScheme

  • Packages that use GradingScheme 
    Package Description
    controller.graph
    This package contains the controller(s) which are related the the Graph portion of the Grader Tool.
    model.assignments_categories
    Package assignments_categories defines objects and operations that are part of Grader tool user's workplace.
    model.gradebook
    This package contains all classes in correlation with the overall Gradebook, such as the Gradebook singleton and the GlobalDBService.
    model.graph
    This package represents model classes dealing with the graphs and curve adjustment features of the Grader Tool.
    model.spreadsheet
    This package contains all the models and services related to the SpreadsheetCourse.
